Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Pamtek HR Helper - Selenium-based Attendance Automation

This project automates Pamtek HR attendance checking with iOS Shortcuts integration.

Features:
- Selenium-based login with JavaScript encryption bypass
- Automatic re-login on session expiration
- Real-time attendance status checking (page refresh on every API call)
- Weekend detection (server-side weekday checking)
- Docker deployment support (Chrome + ChromeDriver)
- iOS Shortcuts integration for location/time-based automation
- Comprehensive documentation (README, Docker Guide, iOS Guide)

Tech Stack:
- Flask REST API server
- Selenium WebDriver for browser automation
- BeautifulSoup for HTML parsing
- Docker containerization
- iOS Shortcuts for automation triggers

API Endpoints:
- GET /api/status - Real-time attendance status with weekend detection
- GET /api/summary - Simple text summary
- GET /health - Health check

Security:
- .env file excluded from git
- Environment variables for credentials
- No test files or debug HTML committed

Ready for deployment on any computer with Docker.
EOF
)")
